column4: TMT[fi] , don't use the n word - you have skills, just because your not familar with Ubuntu is no reason to put yourself down
But i have used other distros for few years before
So i shouldn't be like "Alice in wonderland"
Reason why i used the n-word is that it wasn't my first time in console, that is so basic stuff. Wors of all managed this problem like a n**b, i didn't try to find any info myself before asking here.
